I make web applications, integrations and game development.

dinosaur.description: This is an old personal project of mine where i downloaded the source code of the game in chrome that runs whenever your internet cut out and added a little cheat GUI for it. Open it using the INSERT key.

portfolio.description: The portfolio you are viewing right now! This is my first NUXT application running in a Docker container on my VPS. It comes with multilingual support.
